messages.title: LET'S GET BREXIT DONE
messages.content: So we can focus on YOUR priorities

keyPolicies.policyDescription: By getting Brexit done, we can get on with the priorities we all share.
More money for every single school.

issues.brexitEurope: By getting Brexit done, we can get on with the priorities we all share.
issues.economy: A Corbyn government would deliver more confusion and delay and NOTHING else would get done. Harming our economy and leaving you and your family to pay the price.
issues.education: More money for every single school.
issues.governance: The Labour Party can't govern itself, much less Britain.

quotes.text: Labour's Brexit policy is more delay, more confusion, more indecision.
BAFFLED BY LABOUR'S BREXIT POLICY? YOU'RE NOT ALONE
